Author: fallintothis
Content: If you can't see the .xpi link, you could try https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/5369 which is what the page links to anyway. More specifically, https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/downloads/file/1783... (have Firebug installed first).

Author: Tichy
Content: Did anybody find the download link?

Author: rchambers
Title: How Much Stake Do You Feed An Angel (Investor)?
Content: You know your startup will need outside financing - an angel on your shoulder who blesses you with cash. But you want to keep as much control of your company as possible. What do you do?
